job description:
Thompson Technologies has an immediate need in SFC, CA for a RPA (Robotic Process Automation) Data Analytics Consultant for a 3 month+ consulting engagement.

Why Apply?

Highly visible Big 4 client
Full benefits and PTO while you are on contract (for W2 employees)
Robotic Process Automation in a Financial Functional experience
Work with your Power BI skills on an enterprise efficiency solution

Required Skills & Deliverables

Must have experience with one RPA Tool (ie Blue Prism, OpenSpan, WorkFusion, UI Path, Automation Anywhere)
Expert skills in Power BI
Translate requirements between model builders and the model requesters
Providing client with recommendations related to data analytics
Familiarity with Python or R

Up to 50% West Coast Travel may be required (expenses will be paid)

What happens now? Submit your resume to Brad at bdurham@thompsontechnologies.com - and tell us a little about your background!

Why Thompson Technologies? Weve been recognized among the fastest-growing companies in the country by Inc. 5000 and most recently as one of Atlantas Best and Brightest Companies to Work For, in addition to other awards. A leader in delivering talented, top-tier consultants, we provide unequaled service to the IT staffing industry. At our core, we strive to make a difference in the lives of the people and communities we serve.

#LI-BD1
